Despite a solid performance from Chris Sale on the mound, who struck out 9 batters, the team could not overcome the Cubs' offensive output. Key highlights include: 1. Chris Sale's impressive strikeout total, showcasing his ability to dominate hitters. 2. Marcell Ozuna's two hits, contributing significantly to the Braves' offensive efforts. 3.
